words.prompt: ____________ is the act of expecting something to happen.
When you ____________ a rule, you resist it or refuse to obey it.
If you are ____________, you qualify or have a right to do something.
A person who is ____________ does not support or agree with either side of an argument.
An ____________ person is honest and says what he or she thinks.
If something is ____________, it is saved for a purpose or a special person.
If he ____________ the lost treasure, he went looking for it.
Things that are ____________ are not the same.
When you are ____________, you are amazed and surprised.
When she ____________ her diary, she put it out of sight.
If you are ____________, you are curious.
When you ____________ a difficult paragraph, you explain its meaning and make it easier to understand.
If you are ____________, you are confused.
When you make a ____________ cut with the scissors, you make an exact or accurate cut.
If you ____________, you think about something again.
If you are ____________, you think that someone or something is wrong and cannot be trusted.
Something that is ____________ is lifeless and not able to grow anything.
____________ is putting thoughts or feelings into words or actions.
Something ____________ has importance or a purpose.
____________ are big, fluffy feathers or feathery parts.
____________ is the repetition of the same consonant sound at the beginning of a group of words.
A ____________ poem is a short poem that expresses personal feelings.
____________ is a repeating pattern of stressed and unstressed syllables.
A ____________ is a group of lines in a poem.
